It is the best school ever,  I am in it,  the teachers there are so sweet and friendly and the school is so big and modern, there are 2 play grounds one for primary and the 2nd for preparatory and secondary, it is sooo amazing and I am happy that I am there ❤

By the there some people said that the is not good and the worest but I see that this is the best school everr the teacher are very friendly with the pupils and the class are very clean . there are challenges alot of challenges. Love it 
And I am in it

Nothing,  they make you pay 16 thousand and you get nothing in return. My daughter stayed sick at home for two weeks and no one called to check on her  why she was absent. They charge you over a thousand EGP for the books. They portray themselves as a school with religious beliefs yet they don't apply those beliefs in daily life and they are masters in overcharging the parents. The school bus teacher only showed once every week,  most of the time my daughter was escorted by an older child out of the bus.You have to pay them the first installment before the beginning of the new school year. when I decided to transfer my daughter  to a better school, They deducted 10 % out of my refund as a penalty for withdrawing from their horrible school. and get this, they deducted 10% out of the entire year fee (the 16000) and not just the first installment . even though the school year hadn't started yet by then. Avoid avoid avoid like the plague.

Lived in Maadi 1993. loved it.  People were very friendly. Just simply beautiful then not to sure now. If I could Id move back and stay. Rent is approximately the same then as it is now. There is so much to do.
It is very fun and open to everyone: Just get an I.D.
Summer Camp was not at all what was advertised. Registered my son (13 years old) for Sports Academy who was asked to play the bumble bee on his first visit with 6 year olds. Unacceptable!!!

This. Is. Home. August 2012 - June 2015 will go down in my heart as the happiest I've been in my life, because I was there. Proud to have been there and graduated at the pyramids. I'm 100% serious in saying that you will meet the greatest people there.
